response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value, and we believe it aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $750,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its market value. This offer is designed to ensure that you have the chance to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
